## How to Style Your Pocket Square

One of the greatest things about pocket squares is their versatility. Try different folds like:

- The Presidential Fold for a formal and clean look.
- The Puff Fold for a relaxed yet refined appearance.
- The Winged Puff for a unique and stylish approach.
